title: What is the first feeling you have of the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold2 5G when you get it in hand? - Quora

response.answer_text: First Of All You had Invested So much Money in This Phone and Yes You Had Buyed a very good Phone. And when you get it in your Hand , You'll Get a Premium Feel Like Ya I had a Phone With Great Features with Very Excellent Quality Camera. And Ya This Phone Is Too Good For Meetings, Watching Movies etc. The Price Of this Phone I Think I 1,49,999 not sure but ya it's a very good phone.
